data.title: Toledo City Council Meeting on Oct. 19, 2021
data.meta_description: Toledo City Council will review Mayor Kapszukiewicz’s proposed plan for spending $180.9 million under the federal American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA).
data.meta_site_name: Toledo Regional Chamber of Commerce | Toledo, OH
data.text:
​​​By Tim Schneider, Toledo Regional Chamber of Commerce

At its meeting at 2:00 p.m. on Tuesday, October 19, Toledo City Council will review Mayor Kapszukiewicz’s proposed plan for spending $180.9 million under the federal American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA). The city received half of the ARPA funding last May and the other half is expected in May of 2022. ARPA funds must be obligated by the end of 2024 and spent by the end of 2026.
